interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Eqoba Hair Straightener Detangling Hair Brush Hair Straightening Irons Ceramic Aniti-Scald Comb LCD Display Pink
Review Date: 2016/07/01
Store: Eqoba
Product Description: ['Specifications:Rated Voltage: 110-220VRated Power: 75WFrequency: 50-60HzWire length: About 84.6"Recommended Temperatures:For thicker hair, use 210-230°C /410-445°FFor normal hair, use 190-210°C /375-410°FFor thinner hair, use 170-200°C /340-375°FAdvantages:•Silicone keypad that is durable•360 degree rotatable wire prevents tangles•Includes digital LCD operating display screen•Brush body is made out of high-temperature resistant plastic that is designed from the United States•Ingenious combination of hair straightener and brush, with a 3 in1 function: ceramic iron straightener + detangling brush + anion hair massager•The EQOBA hair straightener\'s heated brush is healthier for your hair. Firstly, when the comb plate reaches 200 °C(392°F), the exterior is only50°C(122°F)so that you will not burn your skin. Secondly, it produces anion when in use which removes frizz and also massages your scalp. Also, anion can combine with air to produce moisture that can help nourish your hairWarnings:1. Please check the condition of the product body and cord before use; don\'t use if there is any damage2. This brush has Auto Shut-Off Protection, it will shut down automatically every half an hour, please restart it if you want to use it again.3. Keep out of reach of children4. Keep away from flammable materials5. Wait until cool before storing the product6. Highest set temperature allowed is 230°C (446°F).However, it is highly recommended that you don\'t use the maximum set temperature over a long period of time as this may damage your hair. Once you are finished using, please pullout the electric plug7. You can use it when your hair is dry or semi dryPackage Includes:1 x Hair Straightener1 x Product Instructions2 x Hair Clips']

profile:
**User Profile Summary:**

- **Product Focus:** User remains primarily interested in eye care products, specifically those that enhance the appearance of eyelashes, but has recently explored hair styling tools.
- **Preferences:** Values products that condition, protect, and lengthen eyelashes with a focus on volumizing effects. The user appreciates ease of use in hair styling products, as evident in their latest positive review.
- **Performance Concerns:** Still sensitive to product performance, particularly regarding flaking in eyelash products. The recent purchase indicates adaptability to other beauty tools that align with ease of use and functionality.
- **Rating Tendencies:** The user has a critical approach to ratings, with previous average ratings around 3.0; however, they demonstrated a willingness to give a five-star rating to a product that met their usability expectations.
- **Experience Expectations:** The user maintains high quality expectations for cosmetic products and has displayed an openness to different types of beauty tools that offer practical performance and usability.
- **Timeframe Engagement:** The user's engagement with beauty products extends back to 2015, indicating a long history with the category, while recent interest may reflect a desire for diversification in their beauty routine.

Overall, the user adopts a cautious yet exploratory approach to beauty products, seeking effective performance and ease of use without compromising on quality, particularly in eyelash enhancement and hair styling.
